definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: separate, remove, set free (NH depart, set free, Niph. also die; Ph. [[פטר]] CIS:102 a, 2 depart (die ?); As. paṭâru, split, break through, ipṭiru, ransom, Tel Am. escape, set free (perh. Canaanit.); Ar.fat.ara cleave, split, also create; Eth. fat’ara: create, fabricate; Aram. [[פְּטַר]], pt.ar withdraw, depart);—
intrans. remove oneself, specif. escape 1Sa 19:10 ([[מִפְּנֵי]], cf. Dr).

trans. set free fr. duty 2Ch 23:8 (acc. pers.), so pass. 1Ch 9:33 Qr (Kt [[פטירים]] adj. or Aram. pt., same mng.); [[יִם]] ´[[פ]] Pr 17:14 set free, let out; pass. [[פְּטוּרֵי חִצִּים]] term. techn. of ornament in temple, dub., usually out-spread (garlands) of flowers 1Ki 6:18, 1Ki 6:29, 1Ki 6:32, 1Ki 6:35.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַפְטִירוּ בְשָׂפָה]] Ps 22:8 they separte with the lip, i. e. open mouth wide (insultingly).
